tha-ap340:17.1: Koseyyakambaliyāni → koseyyakambalīyāni (bj) | koseyyakambalāni ca (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap340:22.1: Aviññattaṃ nivāsemi → aviññatti nisevāmi (pts-vp-pli1ed) | aviññattāni sevāmi (?)
tha-ap340:22.3: Lābhī → lābhimhi (sya1ed, sya2ed) | lābhī hi (pts-vp-pli1ed), annassa pānassa → annapānassa (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
